articles.title: NASA Spots Surfboard-Shaped Object Speeding Past The Moon - ScienceAlert
articles.description: In 2009, NASA launched the Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter (LRO.) Its ongoing mission is to map the lunar surface in detail, locating potential landing sites, resources, and interesting features like lava tubes.

articles.title: See 'Shooting Stars' From Halley's Comet As Top Meteor Shower Peaks - Forbes
articles.description: The Eta Aquariids meteor shower, caused by debris from Halley's Comet, will peak on May 4-5, 2024, in dark, moonless skies.

articles.title: Drinking apple cider vinegar may help with weight loss but its health benefits are overstated - The Conversation
articles.description: Apple cider vinegar has been hailed as the latest immune boosting wonder supplement – but claims should be taken with a pinch of salt. However, there is evidence that it could help with weight loss
articles.content:
